content.text: What's your name?
My name is Mary.
Nice to meet you Mary! What do you do for a living?
I'm a receptionist at a doctor's office.
Oh that sounds interesting! What's it like?
It's pretty fun, I get to meet a lot of different people and help them out.
That's great! What do you like to do outside of work?
I like to study and read. I'm a full-time student studying radiology at a local college.
Oh that's awesome! I'm sure that's a lot of work, but it's great that you're so passionate about it.
Thanks! I'm really excited about it, I can't wait to finish school and start working as a radiologist.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great radiologist.
Thanks! I hope so!
So, what are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different kinds of books, but I really love historical fiction.
Oh that's cool! I've never been a big fan of historical fiction, but I can see the appeal.
Yeah, it's really interesting to learn about different time periods and cultures.
I guess so. I've always been more interested in the present than the past.
That's understandable. I think it's important to learn about the past so that we can understand the present better.
I guess you're right. I'll have to give historical fiction a try sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd like it.
